descripcion: Experience three kick-ass, classic action-adventure titles from SEGA with The Yakuza Remastered Collection now on Steam PC.
Experience three kick-ass, classic action-adventure titles from SEGA with The Yakuza Remastered Collection now on Steam PC.

Motorsport by its very nature is dangerous. DiRT 4 is all about embracing that danger. It’s about the thrill, exhilaration and adrenaline that is absolutely vital to off-road racing. And more than that, it’s about loving that feeling. It’s about pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop. Going for the gap that’s slightly too small. Seeing how much air you can get in a truck. They call it ‘being fearless’. DiRT 4 also features a game-changing system called Your Stage; an innovative rally route creation tool that allows you to produce an almost-infinite number of unique stages at the press of a button. You choose your location and set the route parameters, then Your Stage does the hard work to create a unique rally stage that you can race, share with your friends and then challenge them to beat your time. Your Stage allows experienced rally players to create longer, more technical routes, whilst newcomers can create simpler shorter routes as they hone their skills. With DiRT 4, Codemasters have sought to combine the levels of thrill and realism from last year’s DiRT Rally with the fearless excitement, accessibility and adrenaline-fuelled races previously seen in its critically acclaimed prequels DiRT 2 and DiRT 3. Featuring classic rally racing that continues to build on the foundations set by the Colin McRae Rally games, the bruising contests from the official FIA World Rallycross Championship, the crazy battles of racing trucks and buggies, and the outrageous fun of open events in Joyride, players will face challenges from locations that span three continents. • OVER 50 OF THE MOST BREATH-TAKING OFF-ROAD CARS EVER BUILT – Including Ford Fiesta R5, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI, Subaru WRX STI NR4 and Audi Sport quattro S1 E2• 5 INCREDIBLE RALLY LOCATIONS WITH MILLIONS OF ROUTES – Australia, Spain, Michigan, Sweden & Wales• THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CHAMPIONSHIP – Race at Montalegre, Lohéac Bretagne, Hell, Holjes & Lydden Hill in a multitude of different series• LANDRUSH – Short-course dirt track racing in Pro Buggies, Pro-2 Trucks, Pro-4 Trucks and Crosskart vehicles in California, Nevada and Mexico• JOYRIDE - Laptime challenges, smash challenges, free-play area and send challenges to friends• DiRT ACADEMY – Taking place at the DirtFish Rally School in Washington, USA, learn the skills, techniques and practice to become the best!• CAREER MODE – create your driver, compete across the disciplines, gain sponsors and build your team with clear goals and rewards• COMPETITIVE GAMING – Daily, weekly and month-long challenges against fellow players from around the world• NEXT GENERATION OF RACENET – Live ladder, leagues and tournaments, cross-platform leaderboards, enhanced CREST telemetry system• TUNING – Tweak your set-up based on vehicle, track and weather conditions to best suit your racing style• DAMAGE & REPAIRS – Wear and tear is faithfully recreated with an improved and realistic damage model. Damage can be repaired by hiring Engineers to work in the team’s Service Area between stages but with a finite amount of time available.

Winner of Indie of the Year 2014, and now with VR Support for the HTC Vive, experience classic tabletop games for the digital age with your Tabletop Simulator Steam PC key.GET CREATIVE Players have the ability to create their own twist on classic tabletop games, with additional features such as importing custom assets and automating games with scripting - as well as the opportunity to set up their own complete RPG dungeons and manipulate the physics. Create hinges and joints, and even flip the virtual table in rage when losing to your opponent.Have a go at creating custom decks, importing 3D models, creating scripts, and much more! CLASSIC GAMING With 15 base games including Chess, Poker, Jigsaw Puzzles, Dominoes, and Mahjong - there's something for everyone in Tabletop Simulator. Use the RPG Kit, including tilesets and furniture, as well as animated figurines to create epic battles with your friends - for players who like to control the game's outcome, there’s even an option for 'Game Masters' to take the lead. FUN FOR ALL AGES Whether it's a game of chess with the grandparents, or playing poker with your friends, you'll find plenty of entertaining games to keep you occupied for hours. With Tabletop Simulator primarily based on being a multiplayer-focused game, up to 10 players can play at any given time! FRESH OUT OF THE WORKSHOP Tabletop Simulator is fully supported by Steam Workshop, which means that players have infinite possibilities to shape and create new and exciting ways to enjoy classic games. With the extremely simple modding system in place, you and your friends can create and download thousands of mods on the Workshop - and share your designs with others to enjoy. YOUR OFFICIAL TABLETOP SIMULATOR STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:

The world title is within your grasp, race your heart out and defeat your rivals to claim victory with your F1 2019 Steam PC key. In this action-packed racing sim, you'll experience the official video game of the 2019 FIA Formula One World Championship in one of the most ambitious F1 games in Codemasters’ longstanding history.

The world title is within your grasp, race your heart out and defeat your rivals to claim victory with your F1 2019 Steam PC key. In this action-packed racing sim, you'll experience the official video game of the 2019 FIA Formula One World Championship in one of the most ambitious F1 games in Codemasters’ longstanding history.

Experience the third chapter of the Kazuma Kiryu saga with restored content in 1080p and 60fps.A year after the Kanto-Kansai all-out war, Kazuma Kiryu and Haruka Sawamura have left the unforgiving streets of Kamurocho for the island of Okinawa to run the Morning Glory Orphanage. Despite his efforts, shadows of Kiryu's past threaten to entangle the Morning Glory Orphanage in a deadly power struggle involving the Tojo Clan and political world. Thus begins a dramatic tale set in the ""sleepless city"" of Kamurocho in Tokyo and the tropical lands of Okinawa. Can Kiryu rescue the children of the orphanage from the looming threats emerging from the depths of the underworld and state power?Complete The Dragon of Dojima’s journey.

Universe Sandbox ² is a physics-based space simulator that allows you to create, destroy, and interact on an unimaginable scale.It merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet.Universe Sandbox ² includes the desktop version and a VR mode with support for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift+Touch, and Windows Mixed Reality.

The biggest party pack yet - grab your Jackbox Party Pack 4 Steam PC key now!Boasting not five, but five and a half Steam games for you to enjoy, your Steam key for The Jackbox Party Pack 4 promises a jam-packed session of glorious gaming goodness from the comfort of your own home. FIBBAGE 3 (2-8 players) In this blanking fun sequel, players have access to a new interactivity with the audience by letting them add their own lies to the selection. Fibbage 3 also includes a new separate game mode – Fibbage: Enough About You – which replaces the traditional questions with questions relating to your fellow players. SURVIVE THE INTERNET (3-8 players) Twist your friends’ “online” comments in hilarious ways in this web-based frame game. In Survive the Internet, one player receives a question that asks their opinion on a topic – their answer is then taken out of context and sent to another player, who is then told to determine what the reply was, whilst attempting to twist the words to make the first player look bad. All players are with the original replies and the guessed topic, and must vote on which is the silliest. Each vote earns points for the second player and a smaller number for the first player that provided the reply. The player with the most points at the end is the winner! MONSTER SEEKING MONSTER (3-7 players) Disguise yourself as a monster and attempt to date other players in the spooky Monster Seeking Monster. Players can send up to four messages to other players and, if the audience is participating, they can use lib-style prompts to select phrases to send. Each player then selects another player/monster that they would like to date based on the replies. If two players select each other, they both earn a heart. The player with the most hearts at the end wins the game – don’t forget to use your monster super powers to score bonuses too! BRACKETEERING (3-16 players) The deranged debate match game where players place smart bets on stupid arguments. In Bracketeering, players are given a prompt to complete with funniest answer they can, with the answers randomly placed on a tournament-style grid. The players are then given one of the tournament matchups and must guess which answer will win that match up – the answer that gets the highest percentage of votes wins. CIVIC DOODLE (3-8 players) Civic Doodle will test your doodling skills as two players compete against one another in each round. Players have a short time to draw, with audience members providing real-time feedback on either drawing with preselected emojis. At the end of each round, players and the audience then vote for which drawing is better, with points going to both players based on how many votes they received, as well as an additional bonus points for emoji votes. YOUR OFFICIAL THE JACKBOX PARTY PACK 4 STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:

Motorsport by its very nature is dangerous. DiRT 4 is all about embracing that danger. It’s about the thrill, exhilaration and adrenaline that is absolutely vital to off-road racing. And more than that, it’s about loving that feeling. It’s about pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop. Going for the gap that’s slightly too small. Seeing how much air you can get in a truck. They call it ‘being fearless’. DiRT 4 also features a game-changing system called Your Stage; an innovative rally route creation tool that allows you to produce an almost-infinite number of unique stages at the press of a button. You choose your location and set the route parameters, then Your Stage does the hard work to create a unique rally stage that you can race, share with your friends and then challenge them to beat your time. Your Stage allows experienced rally players to create longer, more technical routes, whilst newcomers can create simpler shorter routes as they hone their skills. With DiRT 4, Codemasters have sought to combine the levels of thrill and realism from last year’s DiRT Rally with the fearless excitement, accessibility and adrenaline-fuelled races previously seen in its critically acclaimed prequels DiRT 2 and DiRT 3. Featuring classic rally racing that continues to build on the foundations set by the Colin McRae Rally games, the bruising contests from the official FIA World Rallycross Championship, the crazy battles of racing trucks and buggies, and the outrageous fun of open events in Joyride, players will face challenges from locations that span three continents. • OVER 50 OF THE MOST BREATH-TAKING OFF-ROAD CARS EVER BUILT – Including Ford Fiesta R5, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI, Subaru WRX STI NR4 and Audi Sport quattro S1 E2• 5 INCREDIBLE RALLY LOCATIONS WITH MILLIONS OF ROUTES – Australia, Spain, Michigan, Sweden & Wales• THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CHAMPIONSHIP – Race at Montalegre, Lohéac Bretagne, Hell, Holjes & Lydden Hill in a multitude of different series• LANDRUSH – Short-course dirt track racing in Pro Buggies, Pro-2 Trucks, Pro-4 Trucks and Crosskart vehicles in California, Nevada and Mexico• JOYRIDE - Laptime challenges, smash challenges, free-play area and send challenges to friends• DiRT ACADEMY – Taking place at the DirtFish Rally School in Washington, USA, learn the skills, techniques and practice to become the best!• CAREER MODE – create your driver, compete across the disciplines, gain sponsors and build your team with clear goals and rewards• COMPETITIVE GAMING – Daily, weekly and month-long challenges against fellow players from around the world• NEXT GENERATION OF RACENET – Live ladder, leagues and tournaments, cross-platform leaderboards, enhanced CREST telemetry system• TUNING – Tweak your set-up based on vehicle, track and weather conditions to best suit your racing style• DAMAGE & REPAIRS – Wear and tear is faithfully recreated with an improved and realistic damage model. With DiRT 4, Codemasters have sought to combine the levels of thrill and realism from last year’s DiRT Rally with the fearless excitement, accessibility and adrenaline-fuelled races previously seen in its critically acclaimed prequels DiRT 2 and DiRT 3. Featuring classic rally racing that continues to build on the foundations set by the Colin McRae Rally games, the bruising contests from the official FIA World Rallycross Championship, the crazy battles of racing trucks and buggies, and the outrageous fun of open events in Joyride, players will face challenges from locations that span three continents. • OVER 50 OF THE MOST BREATH-TAKING OFF-ROAD CARS EVER BUILT – Including Ford Fiesta R5, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI, Subaru WRX STI NR4 and Audi Sport quattro S1 E2• 5 INCREDIBLE RALLY LOCATIONS WITH MILLIONS OF ROUTES – Australia, Spain, Michigan, Sweden & Wales• THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CHAMPIONSHIP – Race at Montalegre, Lohéac Bretagne, Hell, Holjes & Lydden Hill in a multitude of different series• LANDRUSH – Short-course dirt track racing in Pro Buggies, Pro-2 Trucks, Pro-4 Trucks and Crosskart vehicles in California, Nevada and Mexico• JOYRIDE - Laptime challenges, smash challenges, free-play area and send challenges to friends• DiRT ACADEMY – Taking place at the DirtFish Rally School in Washington, USA, learn the skills, techniques and practice to become the best!• CAREER MODE – create your driver, compete across the disciplines, gain sponsors and build your team with clear goals and rewards• COMPETITIVE GAMING – Daily, weekly and month-long challenges against fellow players from around the world• NEXT GENERATION OF RACENET – Live ladder, leagues and tournaments, cross-platform leaderboards, enhanced CREST telemetry system• TUNING – Tweak your set-up based on vehicle, track and weather conditions to best suit your racing style• DAMAGE & REPAIRS – Wear and tear is faithfully recreated with an improved and realistic damage model. Damage can be repaired by hiring Engineers to work in the team’s Service Area between stages but with a finite amount of time available.

The biggest party pack yet - grab your Jackbox Party Pack 4 Steam PC key now!Boasting not five, but five and a half Steam games for you to enjoy, your Steam key for The Jackbox Party Pack 4 promises a jam-packed session of glorious gaming goodness from the comfort of your own home. FIBBAGE 3 (2-8 players) In this blanking fun sequel, players have access to a new interactivity with the audience by letting them add their own lies to the selection. Fibbage 3 also includes a new separate game mode – Fibbage: Enough About You – which replaces the traditional questions with questions relating to your fellow players. SURVIVE THE INTERNET (3-8 players) Twist your friends’ “online” comments in hilarious ways in this web-based frame game. In Survive the Internet, one player receives a question that asks their opinion on a topic – their answer is then taken out of context and sent to another player, who is then told to determine what the reply was, whilst attempting to twist the words to make the first player look bad. All players are with the original replies and the guessed topic, and must vote on which is the silliest. Each vote earns points for the second player and a smaller number for the first player that provided the reply. The player with the most points at the end is the winner! MONSTER SEEKING MONSTER (3-7 players) Disguise yourself as a monster and attempt to date other players in the spooky Monster Seeking Monster. Players can send up to four messages to other players and, if the audience is participating, they can use lib-style prompts to select phrases to send. Each player then selects another player/monster that they would like to date based on the replies. If two players select each other, they both earn a heart. The player with the most hearts at the end wins the game – don’t forget to use your monster super powers to score bonuses too! BRACKETEERING (3-16 players) The deranged debate match game where players place smart bets on stupid arguments. In Bracketeering, players are given a prompt to complete with funniest answer they can, with the answers randomly placed on a tournament-style grid. The players are then given one of the tournament matchups and must guess which answer will win that match up – the answer that gets the highest percentage of votes wins. CIVIC DOODLE (3-8 players) Civic Doodle will test your doodling skills as two players compete against one another in each round. Players have a short time to draw, with audience members providing real-time feedback on either drawing with preselected emojis. At the end of each round, players and the audience then vote for which drawing is better, with points going to both players based on how many votes they received, as well as an additional bonus points for emoji votes. YOUR OFFICIAL THE JACKBOX PARTY PACK 4 STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:

Winner of Indie of the Year 2014, and now with VR Support for the HTC Vive, experience classic tabletop games for the digital age with your Tabletop Simulator Steam PC key.GET CREATIVE Players have the ability to create their own twist on classic tabletop games, with additional features such as importing custom assets and automating games with scripting - as well as the opportunity to set up their own complete RPG dungeons and manipulate the physics. Create hinges and joints, and even flip the virtual table in rage when losing to your opponent.Have a go at creating custom decks, importing 3D models, creating scripts, and much more! CLASSIC GAMING With 15 base games including Chess, Poker, Jigsaw Puzzles, Dominoes, and Mahjong - there's something for everyone in Tabletop Simulator. Use the RPG Kit, including tilesets and furniture, as well as animated figurines to create epic battles with your friends - for players who like to control the game's outcome, there’s even an option for 'Game Masters' to take the lead. FUN FOR ALL AGES Whether it's a game of chess with the grandparents, or playing poker with your friends, you'll find plenty of entertaining games to keep you occupied for hours. With Tabletop Simulator primarily based on being a multiplayer-focused game, up to 10 players can play at any given time! FRESH OUT OF THE WORKSHOP Tabletop Simulator is fully supported by Steam Workshop, which means that players have infinite possibilities to shape and create new and exciting ways to enjoy classic games. With the extremely simple modding system in place, you and your friends can create and download thousands of mods on the Workshop - and share your designs with others to enjoy. YOUR OFFICIAL TABLETOP SIMULATOR STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:

Witness the horrors An intense, gory journey awaits in Killing Floor, an FPS survival horror game that throws players in the heat of battle against hordes of terrifying zombies and mutated creatures. With this Steam key, you’ll be able to enjoy both the solo campaign and play with friends and fellow gamers in six-player online co-op mode in the ‘Overwhelmingly Positive’ rated Steam PC game. ZOMBIES HERE, THERE, EVERYWHERE! Set in London, England, players will go up against flesh-eating zombies in a dark, electrifying atmosphere. There’s many means with which to kill the undead, with a glorious slow-motion ‘ZEDtime’ camera that allows players to take a moment to appreciate their fatal attack amidst often frantic shoot ‘em up gameplay. With 10 different zombie types trying to rip you limb-from-limb, be prepared for a creepy trip through dangerous buildings. From sharp teeth and claws and chainsaws to chain-guns and rocket-launchers, each zombie has a unique attack waiting for you. TAKE CONTROL Experience and enjoy open, non-linear play zones where gamers can choose when and where to fight or, if things get a too tough, run. Keep zombies at bay by welding doors shut and direct the enemy hordes down alternate corridors to your advantage. LOCK AND LOAD Choose from over 33 weapons to take into battle against the undead, ranging from knives and fire-axes to pump shotguns, rifles and even a flamethrower to toast your foes. Item perks including welders, medical tools and body armor can help better equip your team and better your odds of survival. Convert in-game achievements into permanent improvements for your character's skills and abilities, thanks to the Persistent Perks system. YOUR OFFICIAL KILLING FLOOR STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:

The game that defined the survival-horror genre is back! Check out the remastered HD version of Resident Evil. In 1998 a special forces team is sent to investigate some bizarre murders on the outskirts of Raccoon City. Supplies are scarce as they struggle to stay alive. Key Features Graphics

nombre: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER DELUXE EDITION
descripcion: Pump up your online fighting experience and become an ultimate Shinobi master with the NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Deluxe Edition, which includes the base game and all additional content via the Season Pass. Show your might and become an unstoppable ninja wrecking ball in the online action fighting game NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER. With this Deluxe Edition Steam key, you’ll be able to team up with three other players and jump into action-packed, intense arenas in a battle for supremacy. A NEW NARUTO GAMING EXPERIENCE NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER moves the franchise away from its previous arcade-style fighting modes and opens up vast online arena settings for players to explore and conquer. Built from the ground up, SHINOBI STRIKER features a completely new graphic style. CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTER Forge your own path towards becoming the ultimate ninja by creating and customizing your own character to be added into the Naruto Universe. Only the strongest will be chosen for The Ninja League, so prepare to train hard and fight harder. BATTLE IT OUT Engage in 4v4 combat, with each team fielding characters who specialize in Attack, Defense, Ranged and Heal Types. Jump into a number of different modes including Flag Battle (capture the flag), Base Battle (king of the hill) and Combat Battle (brawl/deathmatch). CENTRAL HUB Prepare your character and team for battle by taking part in special missions and training events at the game’s central gathering hub, the Hidden Leaf Village. Here, gamers can complete Ninjutsu Arena training and boss battle-type Missions to earn scrolls and unlock new moves to strengthen your character – as well as unlocking items to change your character’s appearance. YOUR OFFICIAL NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER DELUXE EDITION STEAM KEY GIVES YOU:
